channel.title: dividend yield on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in dividend yield on FinanClub

item.title: T
item.description: score:77 Chances: AT&T’s dividend yield, while high, is considered safe, which can make it an attractive option for investors seeking income. The reduction of the AutoPay discount and planned discounts for other payment methods reflect AT&T’s strategies to optimize its offerings. Despite a drop in stock price, AT&T remains a veteran telecom giant with potential factors that investors should consider before making a decision.

item.title: GGB
item.description: score:178 Chances: Gerdau’s stock has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects, which could drive the stock higher in the near term. Stocks like GGB are attracting investor attention due to their higher dividend yields compared to the industry.
